title: Old Gamertags
body:
I dont know what discussion to throw this in but...

For players who havent played league of legends for a few years or so, does their account remain unaltered? 

I know it would not be acceptable to remove untouched accounts.. but i think it would be cool to be able to buy unused gamertags and no not buy their whole account.

replies.body:
Names from inactive accounts become available after a time depending on the level of the account and the last game played.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-

Should have the information you're looking for.
